title: 149A.11 PUBLICATION OF DISCIPLINARY ACTIONS.
text: The regulatory agencies shall report all disciplinary measures or actions taken to the commissioner. At least annually, the commissioner shall publish and make available to the public a description of all disciplinary measures or actions taken by the regulatory agencies. The publication shall include, for each disciplinary measure or action taken, the name and business address of the licensee, intern, or transfer care specialist; the nature of the misconduct; and the measure or action taken by the regulatory agency.
